Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian pottery chalice; white slip on exterior, glazed streaky brown; edge of foot reserved; trace of slip on underside; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: Very little remains of the sherd. The shape is consistent with light Mature Animal Style, light Grand Style and Chalice Style chalices.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0682) (phase 2)
